s3769: First year of Qin Duke Gong (He)
s4040: Nine, attacked Qi, hostage Qiang, troops stopped.
s4046: First year of Duke Jing of Cai (Gu)
s4054: First year of Duke Cheng of Lu (Hei Gong), spring, Qi took our Long.
s4058: First year of King Gong of Chu (Shen)
s4070: Two, with Jin attacked Qi, Qi returned Wen Yang to us, secretly allied with Chu.
s4071: Ten, Jin Xi Ke defeated duke at An, captured Peng Chou Fu.
s4072: Eleven, with Lu, Cao defeated Qi.
s4074: Two, autumn, Shen Gong Wu Chen stole Zheng Shu's mother fled to Jin, made her Xing grandee. Winter, attacked Wei, Lu, rescued Qi.
s4076: Eleven, Duke Mu died. With feudal lords defeated Qi, reversed invaded territory. Chu attacked us.
s4086: Three, assembled Jin, Song, Wei, Cao attacked Zheng.
s4087: Eleven, Duke Qing went to Jin, wished to make Jin king, Jin did not dare accept.
s4088: Twelve, began establishing six ministers. Led feudal lords attacked Zheng.
s4091: First year of Duke Gong of Song (Xia)
s4092: First year of Duke Ding of Wei (Zang)
s4096: Seventeen, Jin led feudal lords attacked us.
s4102: Four, duke went to Jin, Jin not respectful, duke wished to break Jin alliance with Chu.
s4104: Thirteen, Lu duke came, not respectful.
s4112: Eighteen, Jin Luan Shu took our Fan. Duke Xiang died.
s4120: Fourteen, Liang Mountain collapsed. Bo Zong hid the person but used his words.
s4122: Five, attacked Zheng, because broke us. Duke Dao of Zheng came to accuse.
s4128: First year of Duke Dao of Zheng (Fei), duke went to Chu to accuse.
s4129: First year of Duke Zhao of Yan
s4136: Fifteen, sent Luan Shu to rescue Zheng, then invaded Cai.
s4144: Two, Duke Dao died. Chu attacked us, Jin sent Luan Shu to rescue.
s4146: First year of Wu Shou Meng
s4152: Sixteen, with Wu Chen began communicating with Wu to plot against Chu.
s4512: Four, with Chu attacked Song, Jin led feudal lords attacked us, Qin came to rescue.
s4711: Five, feared Jin communicated with Chu, Yan Ying plotted.
s4714: Eleven, communicated with Qi. Led Chen, Cai attacked Zheng rescued Qi.
s4717: Twenty, Chu led us to attack Zheng.
s4718: Forty-three, Chu led us to attack Zheng.
s4720: Seventeen, Fan Xuan Zi governed. We requested to attack Chen.
s4726: Twenty-five, Qi attacked our northern borders, to avenge Xiao Bo's army.
s4727: Six, Jin attacked us, avenged Zhao Ge. Cui Zhu because Duke Zhuang seduced his wife, assassinated him, established his younger brother as Duke Jing.
s4728: Ten, attacked Qi to Gao Tang, avenged Tai Xing campaign.
s4729: Twenty-nine, duke went to Jin, alliance not concluded.
s4730: Twelve, Wu attacked us, to avenge naval campaign, shot and killed Wu king.
